nodes.text: Alistan Nor was a city that had been built in ancient times by the Force Builders, an offshoot of the Jedi who were devoted to creating fine style, architecture, and starships. By the time leading up to the Battle of Endor, the city had long been abandoned and overtaken by the jungle. During the Quest to build the Arrowhead, Rowan Freemaker visited this city and was ambushed by the Imperial hunter droid M-OC.
